alert.note: Alert for Bartholomew; Jackson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 10:48AM EST until March 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Driftwood River near Edinburgh. East Fork White River from Columbus to Bedford. .Minor flooding will continue or develop along portions of the Driftwood, East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers for the next several days. Flooding is occurring due to significant rainfall which occurred last weekend. Minor flooding primarily impacts local river roads, parks, and agricultural land. The high water situation is likely to begin to improve along northern reaches of the main stem rivers within the next few days, while flooding will last longer further south. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Columbus. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Every Bartholomew county road that approaches or crosses the East Fork White River including Southern Crossing is affected by flood waters. County Road 800 S is extensively flooded in southern Bartholomew County. Mill Race Park in Columbus is extensively flooded. Flood waters on SR 11 in the southbound lane about 1 mile north of CR 800 S. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM EST Wednesday was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 1.7 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1100 PM EST.
